title: Suggestion to release goats in forest to curb leopard attacks laughable: Ajit Pawar
content: Maharashtra Forest Minister Ganesh Naik has suggested that forest officials release goats in large numbers in forests to stop leopards from entering human settlements in search of prey

title: T.N. moves review petition against Supreme Court verdict over planned dam at Mekedatu
content: The Tamil Nadu government has also submitted a representation to the Central Water Commission on December 9 underlining as to how Karnataka’s proposal to construct a dam at Mekedatu would affect Tamil Nadu

title: Kerala local body polls: UDF poised to reclaim Thrissur Corporation; ‘Suresh Gopi wave’ fails to show up
content: The results mark a sharp reversal from the 2020 civic polls, when the UDF narrowly missed power in a dramatic finish

title: 2001 Parliament attack anniversary: Vice President, PM Modi, MPs pay tributes to fallen heroes
content: A brief function is held outside the now old Parliament building (Samvidhan Sadan) every December 13 to mark the day

title: Watch: Nobel Prize recognises that peace requires democracy and freedom, says Machado
content: Nobel Peace Prize laureate and Venezuelan Opposition leader Maria Corina Machado in an interview said President Nicolas Maduro’s government is in its “final days”, warning that political change in Venezuela will come with or without negotiations.

title: Kumbh preparation: NGT stays cutting of trees in Tapovan at Nashik
content: Protests have erupted in Nashik’s Tapovan area, opposing the proposal to cut trees in a 34-acre plot for the construction of Sadhugram and MICE (Meetings, Incentives, Conferences, and Exhibitions) hub in the region through a ₹300 crore project

title: Watch: Political fronts on edge as vote counting in Kerala local body election progresses
content: The results of the 2025 Kerala local body polls will be declared today. Counting of ballots cast by over two crore voters is taking place at 244 centres and 14 district collectorates. Vote counting began at 8 a.m., according to the State Election Commission. The results are expected to shape the future course of campaigning by political parties and fronts in the State ahead of the 2026 Kerala Assembly elections.

title: Intensity ebbed but Operation Sindoor continues, says CDS General Anil Chauhan
content: Gen. Chauhan said modern military operations were no longer defined solely by battlefield engagements but were shaped by a wider spectrum of domains, including cyber, space, information and cognitive warfare

title: Bombay HC quashes State’s appointment of collector as administrator of Shani Shingnapur Temple Trust
content: The Court said the State acted beyond law by bypassing the statutory process; directs restoration of elected trustees and urges speedy framing of rules

title: Bombay High Court stops three financial firms from using ‘Fedex’ name
content: The court says continued use of ‘Fedex’ by financial firms amounts to trademark infringement; rejects claim of honest adoption and plea of protection under old law.

title: Pune land deal row: Revenue officials should have refused faulty registrations, says Maharashtra Deputy CM Ajit Pawar
content: Ajit Pawar’s comments came against the backdrop of a notice issued by the deputy registrar to the firm of his son, Parth Pawar

title: Delhi chokes as AQI nears 'severe' level
content: According to the CPCB data, Wazirpur registered the highest AQI at 445, followed by Vivek Vihar at 444, Jahangirpuri at 442, Anand Vihar at 439, and 437 each in Ashok Vihar and Rohini

title: Kerala local body polls: UDF seems holding to its Ernakulam fort, lead in Kochi Corporation, district panchayat
content: The United Democratic Front was leading in 12 municipalities in Ernakulam out of the 13 in Ernakulam district at 10 a.m.

title: Navjot Kaur asks CM Mann to provide her security
content: Navjot Kaur Sidhu questioned CM Mann’s “silence” over the issues she raised with Punjab Governor Gulab Chand Kataria, and accused him of “facilitating liquor and mining mafia”

title: ‘Hefty’ price for Lionel Messi event ticket; West Bengal Governor seeks report
content: Thousands braved the December chill and waited past midnight to give a rousing welcome to Lionel Messi as he arrived in Kolkata for his whirlwind three-day, four-city GOAT India Tour 2025

title: Rahul Gandhi to meet Lionel Messi in Hyderabad
content: Rahul Gandhi will watch the football match between Messi XI and Chief Minister Revanth Reddy’s XI, which is scheduled to take place during the evening hours

title: UNESCO meet in India ends on Saturday, China to play host to ICH panel session next year
content: The closing ceremony was hosted on Friday evening by India at the temporary pavilion, Plenary Hall, at the fort complex, as delegates will head out for sightseeing on Saturday after days of intense discussion

title: UCC, anti-conversion, land laws in Dhami government booklet on completion of 4 years
content: The booklet — 'Dhami Ki Dhamak - 4 Saal Bemisal' (Dhami's impact - four years of excellence) — was released by Chief Minister Pushkar Singh Dhami

title: 14,526 children died in last three years in Maharashtra: State Health Minister
content: The United Nations Sustainable Development Goals have set the target of reducing the NMR to less than 12 per 1000 births

title: Kerala local body polls: Political fronts wait with bated breath as counting of votes begins
content: The 2025 elections were held to 23,573 wards in 1199 local bodies including the three-tier panchayats,  municipalities and corporations

title: From Jama Masjid pulpit, Mirwaiz seeks end to practice of ‘arresting leaders in decades-old cases’
content: His appeal came days after two senior separatist leaders, JKLF faction head Javed Ahmad Mir and Islamic Students League member Shakeel Ahmad Bakshi, were arrested in Srinagar

title: J&K L-G hands over appointment letters to kin of Nowgam blast victims
content: Paying tributes to the martyrs, Mr. Sinha expressed gratitude to their families. “The entire nation stands shoulder to shoulder with the families to ensure they live a life of comfort and dignity,” the J&K L-G said

title: BJP leader Amarinder Singh calls BJP ‘rigid,’ praises Congress’s flexibility
content: Punjab is a different area. Look at it, everywhere the BJP is pulling through, why not in Punjab? See previous elections, how many seats have some, hardly any, says Captain Amarinder

title: Mohan Yadav says ‘elimination’ of Maoism his biggest feat; Congress rakes up farmer issues, debt
content: The Chief Minister said that the State has received investment proposals of more than ₹32 lakh crore in the past two years and those of ₹8.57 lakh crore have been materialised so far

title: Goa nightclub fire: The party that took a tragic turn
content: On December 6, a fire claimed 25 lives during a party at Birch by Romeo Lane, an establishment in Arpora in Goa. The restaurant-cum-club was built on a salt pan and had only a narrow entrance and exit, survivors and activists allege. Rishikesh Bahadur Desai reports on the night’s happenings and the worries of Goans about unregulated real-estate development, marked by illegal construction, lax fire safety, and poor crowd control

title: Need to take development to Maoist-affected areas, says CM Sai
content: In the past two years, 505 Naxalites have been neutralised, 2,386 have surrendered, and 1,901 have been arrested, says Chhattisgarh Chief Minister Vishnu Deo Sai

title: Very optimistic: India on possibility of sealing trade deal with Oman during PM Modi's visit
content: We have here immense faith that this agreement, if signed during this visit, will significantly deepen the economic ties between India and Oman, says Arun Chatterjee, a Secretary in the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA)

title: Congress to boycott first day of Chhattisgarh Assembly session: LoP Mahant
content: I have made a decision. I am telling my colleagues in front of you that we are completely boycotting the Assembly session on December 14, says Senior Congress leader Charandas Mahant

title: Sivaganga custodial death case: CBI names DSP, Inspector as accused
content: The Central agency files a supplementary charge sheet in the death of B. Ajith Kumar, who was a security guard at Badrakali Amman temple in Madapuram in Sivaganga district

title: Madras High Court clears decks for evicting St. Peter’s Matriculation School in St. Thomas Mount
content: Justices S.M. Subramaniam and C. Kumarappan dismiss a writ petition filed by the school against the government’s refusal to part with the public property

title: Rs 3,600 crore project: Haryana ties up with World Bank to cut pollution
content: Haryana has launched its most ambitious environmental initiative, the 'Haryana Clean Air Project for Sustainable Development,' in collaboration with the World Bank, with a Rs 3,600 crore corpus. This project aims to significantly improve air quality over five years through sweeping interventions, including industrial upgrades, e-bus procurement, and enhanced monitoring infrastructure.

title: ‘Trillions rolling in’: Why Trump’s massive tariffs haven’t resolved American woes
content: President Trump touts rising government revenues and investment pledges as proof of his economic strategy's success. However, many Americans face affordability pressures, creating a disconnect between headline growth and personal finances. Critics argue that while tariffs have increased, they haven't significantly eased cost-of-living strains for households.

title: Parking lot shooting in Canada: 3 Indian-origin men arrested - police share footage
content: Three Indian-origin men were arrested in Brampton, Canada, following a shooting in a parking lot linked to a tow-truck dispute. Peel Regional Police identified the accused as Manjot Bhatti, Navjot Bhatti, and Amanjot Bhatti. The investigation is ongoing, with police seeking an additional suspect.

title: iPhone 17, Google Gemini, DeepSeek and others: Tech that Pakistan Googled most in 2025
content: Google's Year in Search 2025 report reveals Pakistan's top searches, with AI bots like Gemini and Deepseek dominating technology queries. Cricket, local news, and dramas also featured prominently, alongside athlete Abhishek Sharma and popular recipes. "How-to" searches covered diverse topics from e-challans to crypto investments.

title: Nicki Minaj in MAGA era: Singer slams Newsom over trans rights; applauds Trump
content: Nicki Minaj has intensified her political shift to the right, criticizing California Governor Gavin Newsom's pro-trans statements. She accused him of exploiting trans children for political gain, comparing him unfavorably to J.D. Vance. This follows Minaj's previous alignment with anti-trans rhetoric from the Trump administration.

title: Kerala local body polls: UDF leads in Kochi, Thrissur; NDA ahead in Thiruvananthapuram corporation
content: Vote counting for Kerala's 1,199 local bodies commenced with postal ballots, followed by EVMs. Initial trends showed the ruling LDF, opposition UDF, and NDA leading across various local government tiers. The results are crucial for shaping strategies ahead of the 2026 Assembly elections.

title: Indian-origin millionaire tried setting US winery on fire; crashed Tesla
content: An Indian-origin entrepreneur, Beri Vikram, was arrested in Saratoga, California, after allegedly attempting to start a fire, throwing a wine bottle, and crashing his Tesla into two parked cars at a winery. Vikram, founder of BetterLYF Wellness, was apprehended by deputies after resisting arrest and was subsequently charged with assault with a deadly weapon and resisting arrest.

title: Nvidia’s AI challenge: Internal notes cite chaos; enterprise buyers hesitant
content: Nvidia faces significant hurdles selling enterprise AI software, particularly to finance and healthcare clients. Internal emails reveal a "fundamental disconnect" with legal and procurement teams over data security and indemnity. Despite these challenges, software sales projections remain optimistic, with NVAIE exceeding targets, highlighting Nvidia's push for recurring revenue beyond hardware.

title: Aland ‘vote chori’ case: SIT files 22,000-page chargesheet; names ex-Karnataka BJP MLA
content: A Karnataka SIT has charged seven individuals, including former BJP MLA Subhash Guttedar, in a 'vote chori' case involving alleged illegal deletion of 5,994 voters in Aland constituency. This follows earlier claims by Rahul Gandhi, which the Election Commission had dismissed as baseless, stating no online deletions are possible without due process.

title: U19 World Cup | 'Watch me play for Australia': Kohli fan Aryan turns a promise into reality
content: Aryan Sharma, an 11-year-old Virat Kohli fan who once held a placard saying, 'Watch me play for Australia in 2025,' has turned his childhood promise into reality. Now 18, Aryan has been named in Australia’s U19 World Cup squad.

title: 2001 Parliament attack anniversary: PM Modi, Rahul Gandhi pay tribute to fallen heroes – video
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and other leaders across parties paid solemn tribute to security personnel martyred in the 2001 Parliament terror attack.  Remembering their bravery and sacrifice, the nation reaffirmed its unwavering stance against terrorism.  The attack, which claimed 14 lives, was a stark reminder of the threats faced by the "temple of democracy."

title: Climate migration begins: Tuvaluans relocate to Australia; special visas take effect
content: Australia has welcomed the first climate migrants from Tuvalu, a Pacific nation facing inundation due to rising sea levels. A groundbreaking bilateral treaty allows Tuvaluans to live, study, and work in Australia, offering "mobility with dignity" as climate impacts worsen. This initiative marks a significant step in addressing climate-induced displacement.

title: Delhi battles heavy smog: Airport issues advisory; passengers told to contact airlines
content: Delhi's Indira Gandhi International Airport is operating normally despite heavy smog and poor visibility, with low visibility procedures in effect. Air quality in the capital has plunged to 'very poor' levels, with dense fog expected to persist. Residents are advised to limit outdoor activities as the city faces another challenging winter smog episode.

title: Indians on board: Iran seizes oil tanker in Gulf of Oman
content: Iran has seized an oil tanker in the Gulf of Oman. The vessel carried six million litres of diesel fuel. Eighteen crew members from India, Sri Lanka, and Bangladesh were on board. This incident highlights ongoing tensions in the region. Strategic waterways remain a focus for maritime control and international shipping.

title: Single watchdog for higher education: What Viksit Bharat Shiksha Adhikshan Bill sets in motion
content: India is set to overhaul higher education regulation with the Viksit Bharat Shiksha Adhikshan Bill, consolidating multiple bodies into a single authority. This move aims to simplify governance, enhance academic quality, and shift focus from permissions to outcomes. While promising greater institutional autonomy and clearer standards for students, concerns about centralization and effective implementation remain.

title: Bahraich murder: Court says must instil fear in such 'beasts'; sentences accused to death
content: A Bahraich court handed down the death penalty to the main accused in a communal violence murder case, citing the Manusmriti to justify severe punishment. The judge described the killing of a 22-year-old man as "extreme barbarity" involving "demonic torture." The verdict emphasized that fear of punishment is crucial for maintaining social order and public trust in the justice system.

title: 'He won't be India's captain... ': Suryakumar Yadav gets big warning | IND vs SA
content: India's T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav is under scrutiny for a significant dip in form, having gone 20 innings without a fifty. Former batter Aakash Chopra emphasized the captain's primary role is to score runs, especially with the T20 World Cup approaching. Both Yadav and vice-captain Shubman Gill's consistent performances are deemed crucial for the team's confidence.

title: Stablecoins unstable, pose major fin risks: RBI deputy governor
content: RBI Deputy Governor T Rabi Sankar warned that stablecoins pose significant macro-financial risks, including currency substitution and weakened monetary policy. He argued they lack the essential features of modern money, such as fiat status and singleness, and could undermine India's financial architecture. Sankar highlighted that their purported benefits are largely unproven, with domestic systems already offering superior payment solutions.

title: ‘Staff tried saving equipment, dancer, not guests’: Goa fire survivor
content: A sole survivor of a Goa club fire, Bhawana Joshi, has alleged grave negligence by the club and authorities. She claims staff prioritized equipment over people, a door was jammed, and the fire brigade was delayed. Joshi also cited past incidents of mistreatment and overcrowding at the venue.

title: ‘Mohabbat hai’: Messi mania grips Kolkata; couple cancel honeymoon to see football icon
content: A newlywed couple postponed their honeymoon to witness Lionel Messi's arrival in Kolkata, highlighting the immense excitement for his GOAT India Tour 2025. Thousands of fans braved the cold, lining up outside Salt Lake Stadium to greet the football superstar, who arrived early Saturday morning amidst tight security.

title: Gatecrash or misrepresentation? Did Pak PM interrupt Putin's closed-door meeting? Fact check
content: Pakistani Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif faced online criticism on Friday after video alleged that he entered a closed-door meeting between Russian President Vladimir Putin and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, at the International Forum for Peace and Trust in Ashgabat, Turkmenistan. The video was later deleted, claiming that it may have been a "misrepresentation of the events".

title: 'India is a key partner': US lawmakers urge to scrap 50% tariff; warn of economic fallout
content: US lawmakers are pushing to remove steep tariffs on Indian imports, arguing they harm American jobs and consumers. A resolution seeks to end President Trump's national emergency declaration that led to duties up to 50%. This bipartisan move aims to mend the vital US-India partnership and boost economic ties, citing disruptions and increased costs for Americans.

title: Rs 2cr, diamond rings and more: Businessman and DSP Kalpana Verma's family at loggerheads
content: Raipur police are investigating counter-complaints between a businessman and a woman DSP. The DSP's family alleges the businessman extorted over Rs 2 crore, while the businessman's wife claims the DSP refused to return expensive items. No FIR has been filed, with parties advised to approach the court.

title: Tom Brady breaks silence with powerful message as John Cena enters final match
content: Wrestling icon John Cena is preparing for his final match. NFL legend Tom Brady sent a message acknowledging Cena's significant influence. Brady's words focused on the lives Cena touched, both inside and outside the wrestling ring. This recognition goes beyond titles and scripted moments. It celebrates Cena's consistency and accountability.

title: 'I don't pay attention': Vaibhav Suryavanshi on surpassing Virat Kohli | U19 Asia Cup
content: India's 14-year-old cricket sensation, Vaibhav Suryavanshi, has become the nation's most searched personality on Google, even surpassing Virat Kohli. His remarkable 171 off 95 balls in the U19 Asia Cup propelled him to global fame. Despite the immense attention, Suryavanshi remains grounded, focusing solely on his game and taking the newfound popularity in stride.

title: Aishwarya's hydrating routine that keeps her glowing at 52
content: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, at 52, reveals her secret to timeless radiance isn't complex routines but simplicity.  She emphasizes early mornings, staying hydrated, and maintaining hygiene.  Moisturizing daily, a habit since her career began, is crucial.  Her approach highlights that glowing skin and graceful aging stem from consistent, basic self-care and inner confidence, proving a busy life can still be radiant.

title: Luthra brothers' deportation process from Thailand under way - top developments
content: Deportation proceedings are underway for Birch By Romeo Lane owners, Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra, following a devastating fire that killed 25 in Goa. Detained in Thailand after their passports were suspended, the brothers are being coordinated for handover to Indian law enforcement. Goa's Chief Minister vows justice for the victims.

title: Lionel Messi India tour: Full itinerary, cities, venues and key events
content: Football legend Lionel Messi's arrival in India for the GOAT India Tour 2025 has ignited unprecedented fan fervor. Thousands greeted him, showcasing immense popularity. The tour includes fan engagements, football events, and high-profile meetings across Kolkata, Hyderabad, Mumbai, and Delhi, culminating in a meeting with Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

title: Who Is Sherrone Moore’s Wife Kell Moore? Ex-Michigan HC’s Family and Kids
content: University of Michigan football coach Sherrone Moore has been fired after allegations of an inappropriate relationship with a staff member. Athletic Director Warde Manuel confirmed the decision, citing a violation of university policy. Moore's wife, Kelli, and their three daughters are now under public scrutiny as the family navigates this unexpected controversy.

title: Epstein cache surfaces with 19 fresh photos: Trump, Clinton, Bill Gates appear in new images
content: House Oversight Committee Democrats released 19 photos from Jeffrey Epstein's estate, showing interactions with figures like Donald Trump, Bill Clinton, and Bill Gates. The images, part of a larger cache, offer glimpses into these associations. Republicans criticized the selective release, calling it a political tactic against Trump, while Democrats demand further transparency.

title: Zubeen Garg death probe: Manager, organiser among 4 charged
content: In a significant development, Assam Police's Special Investigation Team has submitted a detailed chargesheet concerning the Zubeen Garg case within a swift timeframe of three months. Among the seven individuals implicated, four are facing serious murder charges, while the remaining are being accused of culpable homicide and associated offenses.

title: Messi in Kolkata: Thousands turn out to welcome Argentine icon - See pics
content: Lionel Messi's 'GOAT India Tour 2025' kicked off in Kolkata with thousands braving the cold for a midnight welcome. Despite tight security, fans experienced 'Messi mania' as the football icon arrived for a whirlwind tour across four cities, meeting dignitaries and participating in events.

title: When Vinod Khanna’s second wife called him ‘very taxing’ to live with
content: Vinod Khanna's career took an unexpected turn when he left films for spiritual pursuits with Osho. This period significantly impacted his personal life, leading to his first divorce. After returning, Khanna remarried and found balance. He also built a political career, serving as a Member of Parliament. Khanna continued to deliver memorable performances in his later films before his passing.

title: Delhi AQI: Heavy smog blankets city; air quality edges towards ‘severe' zone
content: Delhi's air quality plummeted to 'very poor' on Saturday, with the AQI reaching 387 and nearing the 'severe' category. Low wind speeds are trapping pollutants, primarily from transport and industrial emissions, with neighboring NCR districts also contributing. Moderate fog is expected to persist, exacerbating health concerns as authorities advise limiting outdoor activities.

title: Cambodia accuses Thailand of fresh air strikes hours after Trump’s ceasefire claim
content: Cambodia accused Thailand of continued air strikes on Saturday, contradicting US President Donald Trump's claim of a ceasefire agreement. Trump stated both nations agreed to halt hostilities along their disputed border, following recent clashes that killed at least 20. Thailand's Prime Minister, however, indicated he asked Trump to press Cambodia for a ceasefire and troop withdrawal.

title: John Cena shocks WWE officials with emotional off-script moment on live Netflix broadcast
content: Wrestling icon John Cena surprised WWE officials and fans by going off-script during a Netflix broadcast, presenting a handwritten tribute to rival AJ Styles. Cena later apologized, admitting he acted alone without approval, emphasizing his respect for the company's creative process. This unexpected moment highlights his emotional retirement tour as he nears his final match.

title: Johnson & Johnson ordered to pay $40 million in baby powder cancer case
content: A California jury ordered Johnson & Johnson to pay $40 million to two women who claimed its talc-based baby powder caused their ovarian cancer. The women testified that decades of use led to major surgeries and chemotherapy. Johnson & Johnson plans to appeal, stating the verdict is aberrant and lacks evidence.

title: In terror acts, rights of accused subservient to national interest: Supreme Court
content: The Supreme Court has ruled that individual liberty, while crucial, cannot override national security concerns in UAPA cases.  Upholding this, the court denied bail to accused in the Jnaneshwari Express derailment case, emphasizing that barbaric acts endangering national integrity are not excusable, even after prolonged incarceration.  The apex court stressed the need for expeditious trials in such grave matters.

title: 'Dhurandhar' Day 8: Ranveer–Akshaye starrer earns Rs 30 cr, weekend total hits Rs 250 cr
content: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' is making waves, crossing the Rs 250 crore mark and eyeing historical box office records. The spy thriller's second Friday collections surged, surpassing its opening day and showing immense growth. With strong word-of-mouth, the film is poised for a massive second weekend, potentially outperforming major hits and setting new benchmarks for Ranveer Singh's career.

title: Expired license, missing approvals: How Luthra brothers ran Goa nightclub illegally
content: A Goa nightclub operated illegally for 18 months without essential permissions and an expired licence, leading to a devastating fire that killed 25. Despite clear violations and a lack of safety measures, authorities failed to act until the tragedy. Owners knowingly risked patrons' lives by operating without mandatory clearances.

title: AI Express eyes IndiGo pilots, its own aviators up in arms
content: Air India Express pilots are protesting the recruitment of new A320 captains, fearing reduced flying hours and pay.  Around 100 pilots have written to management, questioning external hiring when internal utilization is low. They worry this will further impact their ability to meet contracted flying hours and affect their overall compensation.

title: A.P. govt. mandates two e-waste collection drives every month
content: ULBs must hold e-waste collection drives on 10th and 20th of every month, supported by designated collection points, strict record-keeping and a dedicated Nodal Officer, says SOP

title: Trial court concludes that prosecution failed to prove charges against actor Dileep in 2017 actor rape case
content: The prosecution’s case was that the actor conspired with the accused to take revenge against the woman actor for defaming him and wrecking his marital life.

title: India, China hold fresh talks in Beijing; both sides say ‘positive progress’ in ties after Modi–Xi meet
content: The Indian side emphasised on the need for early resolution of outstanding issues pertaining to export control, MEA said in a statement.

title: Terrorist associated with Jaish-e-Mohammad held from J&K’s Pulwama; grenade recovered
content: Acting on credible input about the movement of one suspect at Naner Midoora, one terrorist associate, identified as Musaib Nazir, Son of Nazir Ahmad Teli, resident of Ladhoo Khrew, associated with Jaish e Muhammad, was apprehended, says the police.

title: Supreme Court stays Kerala HC declaration on Munambam land
content: Court clarifies it has not stayed the direction of the High Court upholding the government order appointing an inquiry commission to ascertain ownership of the disputed area

title: Prominent leaders from Assam join the Congress
content: Assam Congress president Gaurav Gogoi said that Assam had been facing serious problems of unemployment during the last ten years of the BJP rule as industries had shut down

title: Are Urvashi’s days too numbered?
content: The iconic single screen in south Bengaluru, which has had over a 50-year run, is in the midst of land litigation

title: Sparkling conversations at the Hyderabad edition of Lit For Life Dialogue
content: Non-fiction authors Manu Pillai, Neha Dixit, and Arundhati Ghosh discuss on feminist perspectives of Mughal history, women workers slipping through economic cracks, and the definition of polyamory

title: Intruder held along border in Jammu: BSF officials
content: The individual identified as Abdul Khalik, has been handed over to Police Post Pargwal for further legal action

title: RSS chief Bhagwat, Home Minister Amit Shah unveil statue of V.D. Savarkar in Andaman & Nicobar Islands
content: The event took place to mark 116 years of Savarkar’s poem titled Sagara Pran Talmalala, which translates as ‘My soul is in torment’

title: All three political fronts expect improved showing in Thiruvananthapuram Corporation
content: While LDF appears confident of winning more than the 51 wards that the front won last time, UDF is vying to increase its tally from just 10 out of the 100 wards. For BJP, realising the decade-long push for power in the Corporation tops its agenda

title: PF contributions on wages beyond ₹15,000 voluntary: Labour Ministry
content: The Code on Social Security replaces the Employees’ Provident Funds and Miscellaneous Provisions Act, 1952

title: Tracing rise and fall of football in Hyderabad; will Messi’s tour reignite the spark?
content: Hyderabad produced a host of players who have represented the country at various international events, including two Olympic Games

title: Anurag Thakur seeks action over e-cigarette use
content: The MP says the use of banned device inside House violates law, decorum and sends wrong message to youth

title: Karnataka updates procedures for medical registration and certification linked to mandatory rural service
content: Candidates completing MBBS, postgraduate, or super-specialty degrees in Karnataka are not eligible for permanent registration until they complete the mandatory service

title: Issue stamp commemorating centenary of Mahatma Gandhi and Sree Narayana Guru’s meeting: K.C. Venugopal
content: During Zero Hour in the Lok Sabha, K.C. Venugopal called on the government to release a commemorative coin and postage stamp to mark the centenary of the 1925 meeting

title: Thirupparankundram row: No evidence to establish stone pillar is a deepathoon, says T.N. govt.
content: Advocate General P.S. Raman, representing the State, referred to the previous judgments in connection to the issue. He pointed out there was no mention of the deepathoon in the orders on the suit filed in 1920 demarcating the portions belonging to the temple and the dargah

title: Government likely to rename MGNREGS to ‘Pujya Bapu Gramin Rozgar Yojana’
content: There was no official announcement on the amended legislation; the Bill is likely to increase the guaranteed employment up to 100 days to 125 days, and introduce tweaks for better utilisation of funds, especially in economically weaker States

title: Kozhikode Corporation Council bids farewell as term nears end
content: The current council will stay in office until the new one takes charge, possibly before December 20; Mayor Beena Philip highlighted the council’s achievements over five years, while opposition councillors voiced regret over projects that had stalled

title: India expresses concern after Thailand-Cambodia fighting damaged Preah Vihear complex
content: Preah Vihear temple complex, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, comprises temples dedicated to Lord Shiva dating back to the 11th century; Archaeological Survey of India has been part of conservation and restoration work on the ancient Khmer temples in Cambodia since 1986

title: Flautist C.A. Sreedhara is known for blending the gayaki and tantrakari styles of playing
content: The multifaceted scholar will receive the Musicologist Award for 2025 from The Music Academy, Chennai.

title: Cover doctors deputed for COVID-19 duty under PMGKY: Supreme Court
content: Supreme Court judgment affirms requisition of doctors and health workers during COVID-19 for PMGKY insurance claims

title: Court calls for fair reporting of court proceedings
content: When the court convened on Friday to decide on the quantum of punishment for the convicts in the 2017 actor rape case, an exasperated Honey M. Varghese, the Principal Sessions Judge, suggested fair reporting of court proceedings and balanced comments without slandering the judicial system

title: CPI(M) unleashing violence out of fear of defeat, says KPCC president Sunny Joseph
content: CPI(M) workers targeted United Democratic Front (UDF) candidates and booth agents on the polling day and afterwards, with even women candidates getting brutally assaulted, alleges KPCC president

title: Watch: Novo Nordisk brings Ozempic to India for type 2 diabetes treatment
content: Danish pharma major Novo Nordisk on December 12, launched its blockbuster type 2 diabetes treatment injection Ozempic, globally popular for its weight-loss benefits. Ozempic is now available in India as 0.25 mg, 0.5 mg and 1 mg in ‘FlexTouch Pen’ - an easy-to-use, once-weekly pen device.

title: CBI arrests six involved in transnational cybercrime
content: The accused persons had manipulated people in the U.S. into transferring $8.5 million to cryptocurrency wallets and foreign bank accounts

title: High vector indices signal dengue alarm in Thiruvananthapuram district
content: Rise in mosquito density is a clear indication that dengue cases can spike any time, say senior Health officials

title: Mendoza adds to honors, scores Maxwell, O'Brien
content: Indiana's Fernando Mendoza captured the Maxwell Award as the nation's player of the year and the Davey O'Brien Award as top quarterback Friday night.

title: Sources: Hoosiers DC Haines gets lucrative deal
content: Indiana has reached an agreement with defensive coordinator Bryant Haines that will make him one of the nation's highest-paid assistants, sources confirmed to ESPN.

title: Moore facing charges of stalking, home invasion
content: Sherrone Moore, abruptly fired this week as Michigan football coach, was charged Friday with three crimes including home invasion and stalking a person he had dated, prosecutors said.

title: Bedard hurt on last-second faceoff, out for Sat.
content: Blackhawks star Connor Bedard grasped his right shoulder as he left the ice after Friday night's 3-2 loss to the Blues, and the team has ruled him out for Saturday's game against Detroit.

title: SGA: Thunder 'absolutely' want NBA wins record
content: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander says the Thunder are after every trophy or record they can obtain, including the NBA's record of 73 wins.

title: Utes' Whittingham stepping down after 21 years
content: Utah coach Kyle Whittingham announced he is stepping down after the team's Dec. 31 bowl game. Whittingham is the Utes' all-time leader in coaching wins with 177.

title: Canucks trade Hughes to Wild for 3 players, pick
content: Canucks captain Quinn Hughes was traded to the Wild for defenseman Zeev Buium, center Marco Rossi, winger Liam Ohgren and a first-round pick on Friday.

title: FIFA hails 5M WC ticket requests amid backlash
content: FIFA said Friday that it had received five million ticket requests in the first 24 hours of the third phase of ticket sales for the 2026 World Cup, despite widespread backlash from supporter groups to the prices being charged.

title: 🍼 Josh Allen, Hailee Steinfeld expecting first child
content: The Buffalo Bills quarterback and the "Sinners" star got married in May and are expecting their first baby together.

title: Our guide to every Week 15 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions and what's at stake
content: Who can improve their chances of making the playoffs? And who is likely out? Picks, predictions and stats for every Week 15 game.

title: What is dry needling and what happened to T.J. Watt? Answering key questions
content: Is dry needling common for NFL players? How long will the Steelers star be sidelined? Here's what we know.

title: Who are the NFL’s hottest head coaching candidates? We list nine coordinators plus one wild card
content: Will former head coaches Vance Joseph and Matt Nagy get another shot? Could Joe Brady get interviews? We stacked the hottest coaching candidates right now.

title: The many shirts of John Cena's WWE career
content: Before John Cena's final match, take a look back at his legendary career through the lens of his iconic shirts.

title: NBA 25 under 25: The best young stars, ranked by future potential
content: Which youngsters are among the next class of superstars? Which are already there? Our NBA experts rank their top 25 under 25.

title: NBA Cup preview: Everything to know about each semifinal in Las Vegas
content: The Emirates NBA Cup semifinals are officially set. Here is everything to know ahead of Saturday's games.

title: Big East Bracketology preview: NCAA tournament predictions for every team
content: UConn has separated itself from St. John's. Three more teams look bubble bound. And one potential sleeper.

title: Who is willing to spend to keep up with the Dodgers and Blue Jays this winter?
content: Baseball insiders were abuzz over L.A. and Toronto at this week's winter meetings, as both have the money -- and pull -- to dominate the winter.

title: Top 50 USMNT players, ranked by club form: A new No. 1 leads the American pool
content: Who are the 50 best USMNT players as 2025 comes to a close? We have a first-time No. 1 in our ranking as the USMNT Player Performance Index returns.

title: Laurens' weekend preview: Liverpool's Salah drama, Tyne-Wear derby returns, more
content: What is Julien Laurens watching this weekend? In addition to big derby games in France, the Netherlands and England, we're all wondering if Mo Salah will feature for Liverpool.

title: What could stop Haaland breaking Shearer's Premier League goal record?
content: For years, Alan Shearer's all-time record of 260 Premier League goals looked like it would never be broken.

title: Dates for Georgia-Bama, LSU-Ole Miss and every other SEC game in 2026
content: Find out when every SEC game will be, including Lane Kiffin's return to Oxford and Georgia's trip to Alabama.

title: Jordan's 23XI antitrust suit pushed dinosaurs out and NASCAR into the future
content: The way NASCAR had long done business had become obsolete, but the antitrust suit brought by Michael Jordan and settled on Thursday, changes that.

title: Expert picks, best bets: Royval's path to victory at UFC Fight Night
content: Where's the value on the final UFC fight card of the year? MMA insiders and a betting expert make their picks for Brandon Royval vs. Manel Kape.

title: Don't be surprised if ... Brock Purdy, Chase Brown are league winners down the stretch
content: With the upcoming schedule, don't be surprised if Brock Purdy and Chase Brown are difference-makers down the stretch.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Bayern plan on meeting to sign Guéhi
content: Bayern Munich are looking to take the initiative to try and sign Crystal Palace's Marc Guéhi. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Gurugram Road Rage Caught On Dashcam As Wrong-Side Scorpio Blocks Car
content: In a road rage incident in Gurugram, the occupants of a Scorpio being driven in the wrong direction were seen threatening a car driver.

title: 'Congress Is A Great Party, But Needs To Revive': Ex-Leader Ashwani Kumar
content: There cannot be an effective opposition in the country without the Congress, but the party has "somewhere lost ground", former Union minister Ashwani Kumar said on Friday, adding that it is a "national obligation" for the party to revive itself.

title: Bengaluru Man Electrocuted While Trying To Save Pet Parrot Worth 2.5 Lakhs
content: An attempt to rescue his pet macaw (a type of parrot) turned fatal for a 32-year-old businessman in Bengaluru after he accidentally touched a high-voltage line and got electrocuted.

title: Cabinet Approves Bill To Raise Foreign Direct Investment In Insurance Sector To 100%
content: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman had proposed to raise the foreign investment limit to 100 per cent from the existing 74 per cent in the insurance sector.

title: From IOC to Moneyboxx, These Stocks Will Trigger Key Payouts and Splits Next Week
content: Canara Robeco Asset Management Company will meet on December 16 to consider declaring an interim dividend.

title: Pankaj Chaudhary, 7-Time MP And OBC Leader, Likely To Be New UP BJP Chief: Sources
content: The BJP is planning to appoint an OBC leader as the state president, considering the 2027 Assembly elections and trying to consolidate non-Yadav votes.

title: Life Convict Found Disguised As Sadhu. He Had Jumped Bail 37 Years Ago
content: A man, sentenced to life imprisonment in an 1986 acid attack case, and absconding ever since he was released on bail around 37 years ago, has been arrested from Madhya Pradesh while living under the guise of a 'sadhu', police said on Friday.

title: Scammer Told Her She Was Named In Terror Case. Then Defrauded Rs 30 Lakh
content: Unidentified fraudsters extorted Rs 30 lakh from a 67-year-old woman in Indore by claiming that her name had surfaced in a terror case investigation and putting her under so-called digital arrest, police said on Friday.

title: Video Shows Truckers' Shootout In Canada, 3 Indian-Origin Men Arrested
content: Three Indian-origin truck drivers have been arrested after a shootout between two rival tow-truck groups in Canada. The search is still on for another suspect, said Peel Regional Police, sharing a video of the shootout in Brampton.

title: Fake IAS Officer Who Drove In Government Vehicles, Hired Gunmen, Arrested
content: A man posing as an IAS officer for the past six months was arrested here, police said on Thursday. They said they nabbed Lalit Kishor of Sitamarhi (Bihar), who posed as IAS officer 'Gaurav Kumar' on Wednesday.

title: SBI Loans To Be Cheaper As It Passes RBI Rate Cut Benefit To Borrowers
content: The country's largest lender State Bank of India (SBI) has reduced its lending rate by 25 basis points, following the Reserve Bank's policy rate cut, making loans cheaper for existing and new borrowers.

title: Bill Gates, Ex-Prince Andrew Seen In New Pics From Epstein's Estate
content: The photo release included images of the right-wing political operative Steve Bannon, billionaires Richard Branson and Bill Gates, filmmaker Woody Allen, former Treasury Secretary Larry Summers and law professor Alan Dershowitz.

title: 'Unsecured Lending Means...': Nithin Kamath Explains Why Zerodha Stays Out
content: The brokerage is doubling down on Loan Against Securities (LAS)a low-risk, asset-backed model aligned with its investor base.

title: "India Important Partner": US Lawmakers Move Resolution To End Trump Tariffs
content: Three members of the US House of Representatives on Friday introduced a resolution aimed at terminating President Donald Trump's national emergency declaration that imposed tariffs of up to 50 per cent on imports from India.

title: On Camera, Australian Politician's Pet Dog Welcomes Bull, Horse Into Home
content: A lawmaker in Australia was left in udder disbelief when he came home to discover his pet dog had let a bull and a horse into his living room. Andrew Mackay, a Northern Territory politician, shared the evidence from his pet cam on social media.

title: IndiGo Will Pay Over Rs 500 Crore To Customers Who Were "Severely Stranded"
content: IndiGo said on Friday that it has estimated the compensation amount will exceed Rs 500 crore for customers whose flights were cancelled within 24 hours of departure and who were left severely stranded at certain airports across the country.

title: Heavy Smog Grips Delhi As Air Quality Nears 'Severe,' Airport Issues Advisory
content: Residents of Delhi woke up to smog on Saturday, with the air quality nearing the 'severe' category. According to data from the Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB), the Air Quality Index (AQI) stood at 390, which falls under the "very poor" categor

title: PMK Leader's Visit To Vijay-Led TVK's Headquarters Sparks Alliance Buzz
content: K Balu said the purpose was his visit was to invite the TVK to participate in their December 17 protest in Chennai, demanding a caste-based survey in the state.

title: As responsibilities evolve, MLB manager salaries still lag behind top coaches in other sports
content: Pat Murphy and Stephen Vogt both won manager of the year for the first time in 2024 . the two became just the second managers in each league to win the award in back-to-back seasons . this year, they became the first managers in a row to receive the award .

title: Encore, Aspinall! Encore, Topuria! Five UFC rematches to look for in 2026
content: two of the first three numbered events in 2026 will feature rematches in the main event . if Brandon Royval wins, it could lead to a no contest in the heavyweight title fight . the men's bantamweight championship is set for 2026 . click here for all the latest news .

title: MLB winter meetings winners, losers and head-scratching moves
content: the 2025 winter meetings didn't have a $700 million-plus deal like last year . but there were still a number of impactful free agent signings . veteran slugger Kyle Schwarber chose to return to the Philadelphia Phillies on a five-year deal in the first major splash of the meetings .

title: Five players who offer upside for your lineup in Week 15
content: fantasy managers should consider starting Jauan Jennings in Week 15 . the playoffs already rolling in ESPN standard leagues and plenty of formats kicking off their tournaments this week . think big-play chops here and favorable deployment based on the week 15 slate of games .

title: The most impactful women's recruit on every 2026 top-25 class roster
content: a look at the most impactful signee in each of the nation's top recruiting classes . the top scouts have a clearer picture of what next season will look like for many of them . last year, no one has done star power like USC coach Lindsay Gottlieb .

title: Men's class rankings: USC into top 10; Tennessee and Texas A&M join
content: the biggest winner of this most recent update was USC . both of their signees made enormous leaps in the player rankings . the Trojans jumped from no. 24 all the way to no. 9 despite not adding any commitments .

title: The NFL's best player through 14 games is ...? Barnwell stacks MVP candidates, picks winner
content: quarterbacks Drake Maye and Matthew Stafford have a clear top two for MVP in the betting market . there's still enough time left in the season for that to shift if another candidate gets hot and leads his team to a division title or a top seed in the conference down the stretch .

title: We made score picks for every postseason college football game
content: the 12-team college football playoff is no longer new . there are more justifiably aggrieved teams at being left out . the annual coaching carousel always impacts the postseason . new coach Pete Golding will make his debut in the biggest game in team history .

title: Notable bowl game mascots, from Tony the Tiger to Pop-Tarts
